channel.title: ProjectRift Server Development
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/25infgj.png[/img][/center]
[i][b]Introduction:[/b][/i] Hello And welcome to my server development thread, I'm going to tell you a little about this rsps. The name off this server is of corse ProjectRift, it is a very new server. Personally, i want this server to be as unique as possible. Unique homes, unique Quests, unique everything ;D, i want this server to stand out from other servers.
[b][i]Server Goals:[/i][/b] - Unique. - Great Player Base. - Webclient. - Great Forum player base. - Great stability. - Better skills.
Pictures: [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2vllbw8.png[/img]
More coming soon.

item.title: ProjectRift Server Development
item.dc:creator: @Serba Serba
item.description:
@Serba wrote:

[quote=“mock pro, post:2, topic:426499”]i dont understand? if this is a server currently in development what are you doing?
all i see is basically a leeched server that changed maybe the home and start package prob
now , i like the new home idea… but i just dont appreciate people that leech man, team up with some ppl, find a good base… idk… somethning productive?[/quote]
It’s in Developments thread also… Most people, start from a base. And this is what i’m doing.

item.title: ProjectRift Server Development
item.dc:creator: @Serba Serba
item.description:
@Serba wrote:

[center][/center]

Introduction:
Hello And welcome to my server development thread, I’m going to tell you a little about this rsps. The name off this server is of corse ProjectRift, it is a very new server. Personally, i want this server to be as unique as possible. Unique homes, unique Quests, unique everything ;D, i want this server to stand out from other servers.

Server Goals:

  • Unique.
  • Great Player Base.
  • Webclient.
  • Great Forum player base.
  • Great stability.
  • Better skills.

Pictures:

2vllbw8.png750×499

More coming soon.

Read full topic
